title: LoL not working on Windows 10
body:
So, I started up my brand new computer and the first thing I did(besides uninstall Norton slow ass piece of shit) was to try and install LoL. It installed fine, and even downloaded the patch to 33%. Then, as it reached around 37%, it froze and the only thing I could do was press the power button until it shut down. Help me I want to play LoL on the new computer {{item:3070}} 
Specifications if anyone needs them:
Processor: Intel core i5-6400 CPU @ 2.70 GHz 
RAM: 8.00 GB
64-bit Win10

replies.body:
That's really weird, I've not heard of this issue before. Can you try patching again, this time ensuring all other programs in the background are closed out?

Let me know if your PC freezes again while patching.
I got a win10 too a few days ago and had 2 Problems so far with it ... should we rather renstal win7?
